original_text: Then Ehud used his left hand to take the sword from his right leg. He pushed it deep into the king's stomach.
korean_text: 에훗이 왼손을 뻗쳐 그의 오른쪽 허벅지 위에서 칼을 빼어 왕의 몸을 찌르매

sentences.original_text: Then Ehud used his left hand
to take the sword from his right leg
He pushed it deep into the king's stomach
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 왕의 배 깊숙이 찔러 넣었다
